mim.name: LratMce
mim.description: It contains the M3 connection classes.

enum.name: AvailStatus
enum.description: The availability status is used to qualify the operational state. It indicates why the operational state has changed its value.

enumMember.name: IN_TEST
enumMember.description: The resource is undergoing a test procedure. If the administrative state is locked or shutting down, normal users are prevented from using the resource.

enumMember.name: FAILED
enumMember.description: The resource has an internal fault that prevents it from operating.

enumMember.name: POWER_OFF
enumMember.description: The resource requires power to be applied and is not powered on.

enumMember.name: OFF_LINE
enumMember.description: The resource requires a routine operation to be performed. This routine operation is to place the resource online and make it available for use. The operation may be manual or automatic, or both. The operational state is disabled.

enumMember.name: OFF_DUTY
enumMember.description: The resource has been made inactive by an internal control process.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY
enumMember.description: The resource cannot operate because some other resource on which it depends is unavailable.

enumMember.name: DEGRADED
enumMember.description: The service available from the resource is degraded in some respect.

enumMember.name: NOT_INSTALLED
enumMember.description: The resource represented by the managed object is not present, or is incomplete.

enumMember.name: LOG_FULL
enumMember.description: Indicates a log full condition. The semantics are defined in CCITT Rec. X.735 | ISO/IEC 10164-6.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_LOCKED
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is locked. Alternatively, the availability status of the other resource is dependency locked.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_FAILED
enumMember.description: The availability status of a resource that this resource depends on is failed or dependency failed.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is shutting down. Alternatively, the availability status of the other resource is dependency shutting down.

enumMember.name: LOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively prohibited from performing services for its users.

enumMember.name: UNLOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively permitted to perform services for its users. This is independent of its inherent operability.

enumMember.name: SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: Use of the resource is administratively permitted to existing instances of use only. While the system remains in the shutting down state the manager may at any time cause the managed object to revert to the locked state.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable.

class.name: MceFunction
class.description: This MO is the top level MO for MCE functions. It contains the M3 connection classes.

action.name: updateMMEConnection
action.description:
This action shall make it possible to order the RBS to make a new DNS lookup to get possible new MME Pool addresses. The orderCode has two different options:
- Retain: This option will retain all connections that were included in DNS response and the connections that weren't included in the response will be removed. For the IP addresses that were unknown for the RBS, the RBS will establish connections to those MMEs.
- Renew All existing: The RBS performs a DNS lookup. Release all M3 connections to the MMEs and connect to the MMEs that are included in the DNS response.
This action should be used only when dnsLookupOnTai has the value ON. The action is rejected if dnsLookupState has the value OFF or if MBMS Service is inoperable.

attribute.name: mceFunctionId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: useM3dnsFormat
attribute.description: This parameter specifies if the DNS lookup shall use the M3 or S1 format for the TAI domain name: m3mme.tac-lb<tac-lb>.tac-hb<tac-hb>.tac.epc.mnc<mnc>.mcc<mcc>.3gppnetwork.org (true) s1mme.tac-lb<tac-lb>.tac-hb<tac-hb>.tac.epc.mnc<mnc>.mcc<mcc>.3gppnetwork.org (false)
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute can cause loss of traffic.

attribute.name: release
attribute.description: The product release of the MceFunction

class.name: TermPointToMmeM3
class.description: Models the MME termination point of an M3 link between the RBS and the MME node.

attribute.name: termPointToMmeM3Id
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state. Note: If this attribute is set to SHUTTING_DOWN, it will immediately go into the state LOCKED.
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute to LOCKED or SHUTTINGDOWN can cause loss of traffic. Loss of MBMS capability if Internal MCE is used.

attribute.name: domainName
attribute.description: The fully-qualified domain name of the MME. A valid domain name consists of 1 or more labels separated by dots (.). Valid characters for a label are limited to letters a - z, A - Z, digits 0 - 9, and the character - (dash). Character case is preserved. Length of a label may not exceed 255 characters. NOTE: The first and last character in the domain name must be one of the following alphanumeric characters a - z, A - Z or digits 0 - 9. For more information refer to RFC 952, 1101 and 1123. To set this attribute, administrativeState must be LOCKED.
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute can cause loss of traffic. Possible loss of MBMS capability if Internal MCE is used.

attribute.name: ipAddress1
attribute.description: The primary IP address of the MME. A unique IP address is required for each MME. The input format is four fields of digits, separated by dots. Each field consists of three digits. The value of each field must be in the range 0-255. To set this attribute, administrativeState must be LOCKED.

attribute.name: ipAddress2
attribute.description: The secondary IP address of the MME. A unique IP address is required for each MME. The input format is four fields of digits, separated by dots. Each field consists of three digits. The value of each field must be in the range 0-255. To set this attribute, administrativeState must be LOCKED.

attribute.name: ipv6Address1
attribute.description: The primary IPv6 address of the MME. The input format is eight fields, separated by colons. Each field consists of four hexadecimal characters. The value of each field must be in the range 0-FFFF. Leading zeroes can be omitted in a field, and multiple groups of 16 bits of zeroes can be compressed to ::. The :: can be used only once in an address. To set this attribute, administrativeState must be LOCKED.

attribute.name: ipv6Address2
attribute.description: The secondary IPv6 address of the MME. The input format is eight fields, separated by colons. Each field consists of four hexadecimal characters. The value of each field must be in the range 0-FFFF. Leading zeroes can be omitted in a field, and multiple groups of 16 bits of zeroes can be compressed to ::. The :: can be used only once in an address. To set this attribute, administrativeState must be LOCKED.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: usedIpAddress
attribute.description:
The destination address used for initialization of the underlying SCTP association of the latest successful M3-Setup.
The IP address can be an IPv4 or an IPv6 address.
Note: usedIpAddress never changes during the lifetime of the SCTP association.
